title: Waldorf77
author: Waldorf77
content: Hi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx If I can understand and capture your information clearly, someone contacted you via telegram and told you to pay for signals to join the forum. I need more clarification, please.Although let me explain more to you about this form, you are welcome to bitcoin talk, where issues pertaining to bitcoin and other cryptocurrency are being discussed. This is the right channel to have adequate information about bitcoin, but to understand more about this forum, I will like to share some links with you that will help you a lot in this forum. You can click Newbies read before posting it will guide on how to operate on the forum. Also you can click Everything you need to know about forum activities,account ranks,merit system  You can also use this Beginners encyclopedia

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx Sorry but I think you are already sounding dumb with your question which only you have answered yourself. How is it possible that someone can provide you with signals that are accurate enough that when you trade it, you would have profits of 3000% monthly, I mean common bro that's just bogus, it's the height of unreal and only a dumb person would fall and pay for something like trading signals that are not certain enough to actually earn you major profits.For the case of some random dude showing up in my dm on telegram or Whatsapp showing me his past successful trade luring me to believe him that he can make me that successful is no common thing again and I usually just ignore such messages because almost all of them are mostly scam related.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? What luck are you insinuating about?QuoteI been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? Figuratively speaking, what I think you should do is to run away as fast as your legs can carry. Delink any channel of communication with that person it's a scam you should be aware of QuoteTo buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx  Many people on socials just want to take advantage of the ignorance of others, and from all you have explained it's shows how ignorant you are. Dedicate your time to learn, study and be a good trader yourself, you just arrived to the crypto environment why not  learn to acquire the trading skills you lack rather than depending on signals from random people on social media who you might be better than.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx You did the right thing asking here and welcome to the world of Crypto Investing, where you will get unrealistic offers that sound too good to be true, first off Telegram is the worst place to communicate with new people who offer you investment packages, there is no such thing as 3000% monthly profit after you paid even if they show you screenshots, because screenshots if you're not good at looking can be altered.You are saved by your skepticism, that is the right way to proceed here in this industry, when there is doubt, don't proceed and always do your research and make your research good.

comments.author: PytagoraZ
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just I have never joined a trading signal but I am quite sure that the trading signal is a hoax. They don't predict the price of crypto, they just play the price by pumping small altcoins to rise significantly in a limited time. It's just a conspiracy between them and their group members to buy in bulk, if they sell the altcoin too late then the price will quickly fall again. I don't recommend you to do something like that at all

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Never join a Trading Signal channel, and make sure to stay away from Telegram. Most of the honeypots are opened where they show edited screenshots, and manipulated videos to new users, and the best sentence they use is: "You will make your $300 in the first trade after joining us, so it's almost free". Never fall for anything like this.Ff you really wanna do trading, learn. Do Paper Trading. Observe what Bitcoin do for months on 4H or Daily Timeframe.

comments.author: DYING_S0UL
comments.body: Not true not trueee. It's a 99.999% scam. There isn't any magical formula that will guarantee 3000%. Are you out of your mind? I don't mean to insult you or behave rudely, don't mind. But if you think that by investing $300 you can gain 3000% monthly, then you need to buy a properly functioning brain first. I mean it.Even if it were true, if I had a foolproof plan to profit that much, I wouldn't even share the secret. Just forget $300. I'd invest $5,000 if that were true. 300$ investment with 3000% gain, doesn't add up, the margin won't even match. If a reputed trusted member of BitcoinTalk said that, I might have believed him. But telegram? It is the paradise of scammers. Don't you know that? One message, and you'll get hundreds of promotional messages every day. Most of them are fake. They will message you today, and the next day you'll see the user doesn't exist. Meaning the scammer deleted the account.My advice would be to avoid anyone who says anything about investigation, profit, or anything like that. Just block them and be with your life.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Well you can start form understanding the forum. Below are links to the forum rules and regulations and frequently asked questions about the forum.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2766177.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0One thing you should know is that you are doing it the wrong way, Crypto-currency is filled with scammers and inexperienced people like you are their target, this is not to say that there aren't real people who sells signals but you chances of getting scammed is high. So take a chill pill, you can learn more about trading first and this forum can guide you on that, never be in a rush it greedy this a factors that can make you vulnerable to scammers.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: If you aim for easy money — regardless if it's inside or outside the cryptocurrency space, you're going to have a really bad time.Focus on learning, and then profitability will follow. It's how it works when having jobs and starting businesses; it's no different here.

comments.author: HONDACD125
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx Earning money or profit cannot be depended only on luck but one has to put in hard work and effort on one's own. If someone has personally contacted you on Telegram and asked to give you a signal for $300, I think you should be careful with such people. Earning money is easy but not as much as you think and 3000% per month, where did you find it so easy?Such people can show you many formulas and signals to trap new people like you. You only have a doubt and I am sure that he cannot give you any benefit. Anyway I like that you thought to consult on this platform and it's always good to get advice. Always try to learn and gain experience on your own instead of depending on others. It may take time but it will be a better decision for your future.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: If you're getting random contacts on telegram about trading signals, you are doing something very wrong with your privacy and security. Exposing yourself to scammers increases the chances of being scammed. Do not join random groups and set your privacy settings to restrict randome users from messaging you.99% of the trading signals floated around on telegram are from scam channels. I will advice you to avoid them.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Scammers are known to use Telegram a lot, they often join public crypto groups to find newbies such as yourself who are greedy enough to believe their lies. If you want to make money from trading, I suggest you learn how to trade by yourself. There is a lot of trading materials and videos on the web where you can learn all about trading. This process may seem tedious and long but it’s the only way you can become successful at trading. There isn’t any shortcut to it, paid signal groups are usually scams and do not even think about giving your money to some trader online to trade for you and give ROI.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Sorry to be rude but my friend you're definitely a newbie. How can you trust the ones who say that they can give you signals with which you can earn 3000% profit monthly? If earning money with crypto-currencies was that easy then every crypto trader would be a millionaire or a billionaire. Easy money means scam and those who such scam get ripped off by the scammers. Always be careful from such scammers they are mainly their to take advantage of less aware people and the greedy ones. Learn about Bitcoin and crypto-market and when you have enough knowledge then start doing simple trades. You'll surely be a good trade if you learn from your mistakes.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I am afraid you joined this forum to earn money, and your first thread indicated this. You are wondering about earning from the future trading so easily and dreaming of being rich over the night. I just don't believe any trading signal group and don't want to pay a penny for their subscription. It's just eyewashing and earning nothing. Don't forget that Telegram is a safe haven for scammers. They will scam you, and you will get nothing. Since you joined the forum, I will advise you to spend more time here for learning purposes. So you can learn about trading as well. Without acquiring the proper knowledge, you may lose your whole portfolio. So just be very careful.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx Dont pay anyone money on telegram, avoid telegram deals, and also avoid paying for any signal for trading as most of them have been proven to be scams and so on, so for you to get the best out of your investment as a newbie, you need to avoid a few things for now.For things like gambling, trading, and any other third-party investment, all you need right now is to buy and hold Bitcoin as the most secure, and stress-free way of investing in cryptocurrency as a newbies.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx You have od the right things by asking this question here.First, all the profit of the future signal showed to use is not real. What you should do is ignore the idea of buying the signal cause it's all a scammer strategy.  The good signal you should buy is to increase your knowledge about crypto trading and investment.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? While earning some profits requires not entirely luck but wisdom and knowledge but you do have what it takes as there's an equal opportunity for everybody for this market.Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMI been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx Good that you're skeptical about that. Someone who brags his profits should just make himself rich first before offering anything that's dubious to any person.Since you have already been skeptic about that, continue on ignoring and completely putting an X mark to that person. Signals are not going to make you rich but if you want to, you'll help the organizer or owner of it become rich.

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: Quote from: Waldorf77 on November 04, 2023, 08:52:27 PMHi , so where do i start do i have any luck to earn some profit? I been contacted on Telegram someone told to pay signals 300$ ....he showed to his binance profits futures signals.Im sceptical so i ask here other what should i do ? To buy signals ? And what's the signals price then ? Will i earn 3000% monthly really with payed signals ?? Indont belive is that Easy to make money ?  Sorry i don't want to sound dumb but i really don't know and i don't want to lose for no reason just Tnx OP, you mustn't go into something you have no idea of and bringing it here might help you out but before you start up this investment have you asked yourself if you're ready to do this? Why are you really doing it? Whosoever introduced you to trading need to enlighten you more on so many things not all about making profit all the time.You being a newbie and you're going deep in getting signals that would do what to your trading? Make you a millionaire over night? You're really desperate, in trading you need a lot of patience and I think is best to learn from the scratch before getting things you have no idea of.
